name: Reality Hopper
description:
As we all know, orange is NOT real. Blue is the only real color.

Platform through challenges and bend reality itself.

Controls
You can use a keyboard or gamepad.

Keyboard:

  • Move: Left and right arrows / A and D
  • Jump: Space / X (Menu confirmation with enter)
  • Reality Change: C
  • Pause Menu: Escape

Gamepad:

  • Move: Left stick / D-pad (Stick recommended as I somehow messed up the D-pad controls
  • Jump: A / X
  • Reality Change: X / Square
  • Pause Menu: Start / Options or whatever

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
